DOC.brief_summary: Exposure Mozart music significantly lower rest energy expenditure ( REE ) healthy preterm infant . Whether find related music per-se music Mozart unknown . The objective study whether J.S . Bach music lower effect REE similar Mozart music .
DOC.brief_title: Bach Music Preterm Infants : No `` Mozart Effect '' Resting Energy Expenditure
DOC.criteria: Preterm infants post menstrual age 3037 week appropriate gestational age , clinically thermally stable , gavagefed , eligible recruitment . At time study tolerate full enteral feeding ( 150160 cc/kg weight/day ) without significant gastric residual ( < 5 % total feed ) , grow steadily , electrolyte imbalance . All infant recruit successfully pass hearing screen test prior discharge ( otoacoustic emission automate auditory brainstem response ) Infants significant complication prematurity intraventricular hemorrhage , periventricular leucomalacia , necrotizing enterocolitis , active apnea prematurity , patent ductus arteriosus , active infection , electrolyte imbalance major congenital anomaly .
